title: Synthesis of “all-in-one” hypercrosslinked organic polymers: experimental and kinetic models for CO2 chemical fixation and iodine adsorption
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01033G, Paper
Xuanbo Liu, Yongjing Hao, Xiuli Yan, Yuhang Zhang, Xionglei Wang, Zheng Zhu, Jiajia Yang, Shuangshuo Li, Tao Chang, Shenjun Qin
A series of “all-in-one” hypercrosslinked polymers have been constructed by Friedel–Crafts alkylation and quaternization reactions, which exhibit superior CO2 conversion performance and effective iodine adsorption capacity.
